entries.title: First encounter
entries.content:
The day we met my heart took flight 
 Your Haryanvi tone just felt so right.
 I judged too soon led by the crowd 
 But I'm glad I was wrong—so deeply proud.

entries.title: Breaking Misconceptions
entries.content: Today, I kept my distance because I had already built an image of you in my mind. But when I was leaving at 5:30 pm, you said something that shattered my misconception. I realized you don’t have an attitude problem at all you actually have a very sweet heart.

entries.title: A Hint
entries.content: This day I got a hint from you but.. maine notice nhi kiya kuki.... you already said me bhaiya in our first meet.

entries.title: Chocolate
entries.content: I took a chocolate for you to just see your reaction and start a conversation to see.... what is it.. bro.. and then you actually said things.. like... 'ye haye usually sbke liye nhi kerti and all' that's hit me.. but still vohi feeling that maybe you are just comfortable around me as a big brother so, I again stopped myself.

entries.title: Started
entries.content: I took a chocolate for you to just see your reaction and start a conversation to see.... what is it.. bro.. and then you actually said things.. like... 'ye haye usually sbke liye nhi kerti and all' that's hit me.. but still vohi feeling that maybe you are just comfortable around me as a big brother so, I again stopped myself.
